Title: Humble Politician Nograj
Writer: Saad Khan (screenplay), Danish Sait (story), Saad Khan (story), Danish Sait (dialogue), Vamsidhar Bhogaraju (dialogue), Saad Khan (dialogue)
Actors: Danish Sait, Sumukhi Suresh, Sruthi Hariharan, Vijay Chendoor
Plot: Danish plays the title character of Nograj, a narcissistic crazy politician who exploits a city and its resources. The film is about Nograj's aspirations to becoming the MLA in the upcoming elections and the opposition he faces.
